snippet: “Samantha Spade, Ace Detective” has in its arsenal a parody of a scene from “The Maltese Falcon,” as teenagers at summer camp search for a “Maltball Falcon.”
abstract: Laurel Graeber reviews Lisa Diana Shapiro family musical Samantha Spade, Ace Detective: The Case of the Maltball Falcon, directed and choreographed by Joanna Greer, at Tada! Youth Theater.
lead_paragraph: “Samantha Spade, Ace Detective” has in its arsenal a parody of a scene from “The Maltese Falcon,” as teenagers at summer camp search for a “Maltball Falcon.”

headline.seo: ‘Samantha Spade, Ace Detective,’ Tale of a Teenage Sleuth
headline.main: Shamus, That’s the Stuff That Wedgies Are Made Of
headline.print_headline: Shamus, That’s the Stuff That Wedgies Are Made Of
